title: Rolling In the Deep
author: Adele
lyrics:
[00:05.17] There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:09.77] Reaching a fever pitch, it's bringing me out the dark
[00:14.25] Finally I can see you crystal clear
[00:19.07] Go ahead and sell me out and I'll lay your ship bare
[00:23.46] See how I'll leave with every piece of you
[00:27.85] Don't underestimate the things that I will do
[00:32.57] There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:37.22] Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out the dark
[00:42.79] The scars of your love remind me of us
[00:47.23] They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
[00:51.85] The scars of your love they leave me breathless
[00:56.34] I can't help feeling
[00:58.78] We could've had it all (you're gonna wish you)
[01:02.23] (Never had met me)
[01:03.52] Rolling in the deep (tears are gonna fall)
[01:06.95] (Rolling in the deep)
[01:07.90] You had my heart inside (you're gonna wish you)
[01:10.78] Of your hands (never had met me)
[01:12.87] And you played it (tears are gonna fall)
[01:15.22] To the beat (rolling in the deep)
[01:18.33] Baby, I have no story to be told
[01:22.72] But I've heard one on you, now I'm gonna make your head burn
[01:27.51] Think of me in the depths of your despair
[01:32.09] Make a home down there, as mine sure won't be shared
[01:36.51] (You're gonna wish you)
[01:37.63] The scars of your love (never had met me)
[01:39.97] Remind me of us (tears are gonna fall)
[01:42.15] They keep me thinking (rolling in the deep)
[01:44.22] That we almost had it all (you're gonna wish you)
[01:46.92] The scars of your love (never had met me)
[01:49.08] They leave me breathless (tears are gonna fall)
[01:51.39] I can't help feeling (rolling in the deep)
[01:53.40] We could've had it all (you're gonna wish you)
[01:57.23] (Never had met me)
[01:58.66] Rolling in the deep (tears are gonna fall)
[02:02.06] (Rolling in the deep)
[02:02.89] You had my heart inside (you're gonna wish you)
[02:05.62] Of your hands (never had met me)
[02:07.78] And you played it (tears are gonna fall)
[02:10.08] To the beat (rolling in the deep)
[02:12.06] We could've had it all
[02:16.43] Rolling in the deep
[02:21.13] You had my heart inside of your hand
[02:26.14] But you played it with a beating
[02:31.77] Throw your soul through every open door (whoa)
[02:36.25] Count your blessings to find what you look for (whoa)
[02:40.69] Turn my sorrow into treasured gold (whoa)
[02:45.08] You pay me back in kind and reap just what you've sown
[02:49.93] (You're gonna wish you never had met me)
[02:53.26] We could've had it all (tears are gonna fall, rolling in the deep)
[02:57.60] We could've had it all (you're gonna wish you never had met me)
[03:03.27] It all, it all, it all (tears are gonna fall, rolling in the deep)
[03:06.98] We could've had it all (you're gonna wish you)
[03:10.41] (Never had met me)
[03:11.57] Rolling in the deep (tears are gonna fall)
[03:14.80] (Rolling in the deep)
[03:15.95] You had my heart inside (you're gonna wish you)
[03:18.84] Of your hands (never had met me)
[03:21.15] And you played it (tears are gonna fall)
[03:23.17] To the beat (rolling in the deep)
[03:25.27] Could've had it all (you're gonna wish you)
[03:28.64] (Never had met me)
[03:29.97] Rolling in the deep (tears are gonna fall)
[03:33.37] (Rolling in the deep)
[03:34.18] You had my heart inside (you're gonna wish you)
[03:36.93] Of your hands (never had met me)
[03:39.53] But you played it, you played it, you played it
[03:42.98] You played it to the beat
[03:45.03]
